agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Public Education TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Huberty *Testimony will be limited to two (2) minutes* HB 3 Huberty | et al. Relating to public school finance and public education. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
